reviewText: It was a very powerful and inspiring movie..It showed the simplicity involved with mindful living...
This was an excellent presentation to a simple form of meditation.

Over the past two years I've read many books on how the human mind works and ways to live including many of Thich Nhat Hanh's. While most of Hanh's work I've read emphasizes changing daily life through cultivating the mind, Beyond The Self describes a complete overhaul of our world view on the most basic levels.

I love this video, it's great for anyone interested in learning about mindfulness and bringing peace into their lives as taught by Thich Nhat Hanh. I found the video highly inspirational and I felt more peaceful just watching it. I highly recommend this beautiful video.
